author: LMG Clips
description:
Thanks to our LMG clips sponsors dbrand, Dell, and Secretlab. You can check them out at the links below:

dbrand: https://dbrand.com/pcb
Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Microsoft’s long-rumoured handheld gaming mode for Windows 11 has leaked, and we got it running on the ASUS ROG Ally X. The new UI feels console-like, with quick resume, Steam and Game Pass support, cloud gaming integration, and accessibility features built in. It’s still in preview, but this could be the start of Windows becoming a serious handheld gaming platform.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKmYYnMdW7E

title: We Tried the New “Gaming” Version of Windows

Nvidia shocked the industry with a $5 billion investment into Intel’s common stock, joining the U.S. government as major shareholders. Linus and Luke discuss what this partnership could mean for CPUs, GPUs, and the future of AI infrastructure.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKmYYnMdW7E

title: Why Nvidia Is Teaming Up With Intel
